vote.title: Appointment of Ken Paul, Chief of Staff, Office of the Mayor, 90 West Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the North Market Development Authority Board of Trustees, with a term expiration date of December 31, 2023 (biography attached).
